text: The lawyers for producer Dr. Luke filed court papers Friday night demanding Lady Gaga to set a deposition date for his defamation case about singer Kesha. Gaga, who has been subpoenaed in the case, has been an outspoken supporter of Kesha during the latter's legal battle against Luke over claims he drugged, raped and emotionally abused her. The move comes after Gaga failed to appear for her deposition on an earlier date and chose not to provide an alternative deposition date.
